attributes.action: Defend the freedom to critique Islam – stop ‘Islamophobia’ blasphemy law
attributes.additional_details: No other group is protected from criticism or even mockery of its beliefs – Muslims should not receive special treatment that amounts to an Islamic blasphemy law.
attributes.background: The government needs to protect free speech on Islam, not take it away.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government have said that they are not going to introduce blasphemy laws:
https://hansard.parliament.uk/Commons/2024-12-18/debates/ba455fa1-fb15-4e1b-b4c9-884dfdaeb83e/CommonsChamber#contribution-83E4227E-B766-4980-9AFC-A77C90D20A59

It is therefore unclear what further action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.
